mapper.select: SELECT * FROM post WHERE pid=#{pid} LIMIT 1
SELECT fid FROM post WHERE pid=#{pid}

SELECT fpost.*,f.name AS forum_name,avatar,level,IFNULL(username,'用户已注销') AS username, (CASE WHEN #{uid} IS null THEN false
WHEN pl.id IS null THEN false
ELSE true END) AS is_like FROM (SELECT * FROM post WHERE pid=#{pid}) fpost LEFT JOIN user u ON fpost.uid = u.uid LEFT JOIN forum_user fu ON fpost.fid = fu.fid AND fpost.uid = fu.uid LEFT JOIN forum f ON fpost.fid = f.fid
LEFT JOIN post_like pl ON fpost.pid = pl.pid AND pl.uid = #{uid}
LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET reading_num=reading_num+1 WHERE pid=#{pid}
UPDATE post SET reply_num=reply_num+1 WHERE pid=#{pid}
UPDATE post SET last_date=#{lastDate} WHERE pid=#{pid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (content, fid, last_date, post_time, title, uid, picture) VALUES (#{content},#{fId},#{lastDate},#{postTime},#{title},#{uId},#{picture})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM post WHERE pid=#{pid}; DELETE FROM reply WHERE pid=#{pid};
